text: The National Union for the Total Independence of Angola (UNITA, ) is the second-largest political party in Angola. Founded in 1966, UNITA fought alongside the MPLA in the Angolan War of Independence and then against the MPLA in the Angolan Civil War. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Political parties in Angola Category:20th-century establishments in Angola Category:1966 establishments in Africa
title: UNITA
